GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/categories.description: serves an array of all categories

categories.description: Players attempt to uncover each other's hidden role

GET /api/reviews.description: serves an array of all reviews

GET /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object containing a review with the given review_id with a comment_count

review.title: Jenga
review.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

PATCH /api/reviews/:review_id.description: serves an object containing a review with its votes incremented to the number given (can be positive or negative)

updatedReview.title: Jenga
updatedReview.review_body: Fiddly fun for all the family

GET /api/reviews/review_id/comments.description: serves an array of all the comments belonging to the review of the given review_id

comments.body: Now this is a story all about how, board games turned my life upside down
comments.author: mallionaire

POST /api/reviews/review_id/comments.description: serves an object of the new comment that has been sent

GET /api/users.description: serves an array of all users

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: serves an empty object indicating that the comment on the given id has been deleted, or an error if the comment doesn't exist
